name: vika - sandbox and platformer
description:
Blimey!

We have already released vika 0.0.1! We're ahead of schedule by a month! Interesting?

We are the delibaltov team! We create only what you want to play!

The game has an endless level where you can destroy and build, go through the abyss, destroy the aliens! And the landscape is also randomly generated! Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! They did not expect? That's not all! We have a level builder! In it you are limited only by the number of items! We are constantly replenishing them, which means there is complete freedom! Save your levels, play your created levels! And in this version, the long-awaited open world appeared! There you can create anything without borders, or you can get items, and then build from them! Everything depends on you! It's all up to you! And then it can be saved and resumed! Also, in the level and the open world, it became possible to turn on a mode where the character cannot die from spikes or from alien bullets! Here is the news!

Well, if you like it, then please support our team by purchasing the game! Thanks a lot! We hug you!

Let's talk about management!

Move around with the arrows and space bar.

To shoot a sphere, use the "2" key.

To illuminate the world with light, use the "1" key.

To destroy the alien, shoot him with a sphere or jump on his flying saucer!

To destroy a stone wall, illuminate everything around with light or move the cursor over it and press the right mouse button!

To place a block, press the left key!

Try using the "i" key. In the constructor and the open world, it can hide or open the list of items. She can also hide the number of hearts and stone blocks in the constructor and in the level.

IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS, PLEASE CONTACT SUPPORT.
